GW_Plugins_Error_Snowboy: is not comptatible with Snowboy detector
GW_Plugins_Error_Porcupine: is not comptatible with Porcupine detector
GW_Tools_subTitle: MMM-GoogleAssistant can offer you more control ! (only available displayed)
GW_Tools_Webview_Header: Modify electron Options for using properly with EXT plugins
GW_Tools_Alert_Text: Send a message to your mirror
GW_Tools_Volume_Text_Record: Define the microphone level of your mirror
GW_Tools_Volume_Text: Define the volume of your mirror
GW_About_Info_Donate_Text: Just a little coffee... for better coding!
GW_Restart: Please restart MagicMirror² to apply new configuration!
EXT-Background: Change the default Google Assistant background to your own or with animated gifs for each status of the assistant.
EXT-Browser: Display any internet web page like a real browser in fullscreen
EXT-FreeboxTV: Display Channel from French Internet Provider: Free
EXT-GooglePhotos: Display your album directory with Google photos API in background or in MagicMirror² position
EXT-Keyboard: Control your mirror with a keyboard
EXT-Librespot: Allow to play Spotify music on your mirror with Librespot.
EXT-MusicPlayer: Play any music found on a USB Key or in defined local directory.
EXT-Pages: This plugin allows you to have animated pages
EXT-Photos: Displaying any photos discover by assistant in fullscreen
EXT-Screen: After a configurated time without any user interaction the display will turn off and hide all modules for economy mode.
EXT-SmartHome: Allow to control MMM-GoogleAssistant from GoogleHome App.
EXT-Spotify: This plugin show current spotify playback of any devices.
EXT-StreamDeck: Control your mirror with a StreamDeck by elgato©
EXT-TelegramBot: You can remote-control plugins within Telegram.
EXT-Touch: Activate MMM-GoogleAssistant with a Touch Screen by Touching the Google Icon
EXT-Updates: This plugin allow to auto-update if an update is detected.
EXT-VLCServer: Media Server for playing any media
EXT-Volume: Control the sound volume level of your mirror.
EXT-Welcome: Allow to send a welcome on start of MagicMirror².
EXT-YouTube: This plugins allows to play YouTube video (reserved to donator).
EXT-YouTubeCast: Allow to cast a YouTube video on MagicMirror².
VAL_PluginAnimateIn: Animation Name when the module appears
VAL_PluginAnimateOut: Name of the animation when the module will hide
VAL_PluginConfigDeepMerge: Automatically merge with the default configuration if a feature is missing in the configuration
VAL_EXT-Background_Image: Choose your personal image, if don't want model
VAL_EXT-Browser_Delay: Delay before closing the browser automaticaly in ms. If you want to disable this delay, set it to 0 (default is 60 secs)
VAL_EXT-Browser_Step: Scrolling step in px for scrolling down
VAL_EXT-Browser_Start: Delay before scrolling down in ms (after url loaded)
VAL_EXT-Detector_Icon: Display Google Icon and animate it when keyword discover
VAL_EXT-Detector_Sensitivity: Sensitivity of detection of the keyword
VAL_EXT-GooglePhotos_Type: How displaying Google Photos? (0: in Fullscreen, 1: in MagicMirror² position)
VAL_EXT-GooglePhotos_Delay: Delay before displaying next photo in the iframe (default is 10 secs)
VAL_EXT-GooglePhotos_Infos: Displaying name of the album and photo time
VAL_EXT-GooglePhotos_Albums: Names of Google Photos album folders to display
VAL_EXT-GooglePhotos_Background: Displaying a blurred decoration of the photo
VAL_EXT-GooglePhotos_Sort: Sort received google photos new, old, random
VAL_EXT-GooglePhotos_uploadAlbum: Name of the album to upload any photos
VAL_EXT-Keyboard_keyFinder: Display an alert with keycode when a key is pressed
VAL_EXT-Librespot_Min: Volume to set when assistant speaking (in %)
VAL_EXT-MusicPlayer_USB: If you prefer play file from an USB Key, set it to true
VAL_EXT-MusicPlayer_Path: Music path for playing music from Local Files
VAL_EXT-MusicPlayer_Check: Should this module inspect sub directory for create music list ?
VAL_EXT-MusicPlayer_Start: AutoStart USB key Music at boot of MagicMirror² or when USB key is plugged in
VAL_EXT-MusicPlayer_Min: Volume to set when assistant speaking (in %)
VAL_EXT-MusicPlayer_Max: Volume to set when music playing (in %)
VAL_EXT-Pages_pages: An Object String number of what each module should be on which page. Note that all entries must take their class name (see wiki)
VAL_EXT-Pages_fixed: Which modules should show up all the time. (see wiki)
VAL_EXT-Pages_hiddenPages: An Object defining special hiddenPages which are not available on the normal page rotation and only accassible via a notification. (see wiki)
VAL_EXT-Pages_animationTime: Fading animation time. Set to 0 for instant change. Value is in milliseconds (1 second = 1000 milliseconds).
VAL_EXT-Pages_rotationTime: Time, in milliseconds, between automatic page changes.
VAL_EXT-Pages_rotationTimes: An Object with page number and associated delay times before changing page (will enforce rotationTime value)
VAL_EXT-Pages_homePage: Which page index is the home page. If none is set, this returns to the leftmost page instead.
VAL_EXT-Pages_hideBeforeRotation: Hide all modules before rotating except fixed.
VAL_EXT-Pages_Gateway: Gateway rules for displaying plugins page automaticaly (see wiki)
VAL_EXT-Photos_Delay: Delay before change photo automaticaly in ms. (default is 20 secs)
VAL_EXT-Photos_Loop: Make a loop on all photos
VAL_EXT-RadioPlayer_Min: Volume to set when assistant speaking (in %)
VAL_EXT-RadioPlayer_Max: Volume to set when radio playing (in %)
VAL_EXT-Screen_Sleeping: Activate ONLY EXT-Detector only when display is on
VAL_EXT-Spotify_Interval: Update interval when playing (refresh) in ms
VAL_EXT-Spotify_Idle: Update interval when idle (check if Spotify active) in ms
VAL_EXT-Spotify_BottomBar: Activate visual of the current playback in the bottom bar
VAL_EXT-Spotify_ID: Client ID of your Spotify account
VAL_EXT-Spotify_Secret: Client Secret of your Spotify account
VAL_EXT-StreamDeck_device: Path of the StreamDeck to use. null = the default
VAL_EXT-StreamDeck_brightness: Set the brightness of the streamDeck
VAL_EXT-StreamDeck_logo: Set the logo to display (only in png)
VAL_EXT-TelegramBot_adminChatId: Chat ID of the room (result of /mychatid command)
VAL_EXT-TelegramBot_commandAllowed: List of commands that can be used by users
VAL_EXT-TelegramBot_useWelcomeMessage: Send a welcome at wake up
VAL_EXT-TelegramBot_useSoundNotification: Use Official notification sound, on incomming messages for telecast
VAL_EXT-TelegramBot_TelegramBotServiceAl: Display all Alert of TelegramBot Service
VAL_EXT-TelegramBot_telecast: Allow telecast on mirror or a specific room
VAL_EXT-TelegramBot_telecastHideOverflow: When overflowed old chats will be hidden
VAL_EXT-TelegramBot_telecastContainer: Force width of the telecast container in px
VAL_EXT-Updates_AutoUpdate: If you want an automated update process, just activate it!
VAL_EXT-Updates_Log: This feature is needed for user who don't use PM2 ! Log process and result in console
VAL_EXT-Updates_Timeout: Maximum execution time of an update in ms (default: 2 mins)
VAL_EXT-Updates_Welcome: Informs MagicMirror² PID process number at startup (with MMM-GoogleAssistant alert displayer or EXT-TelegramBot)
VAL_EXT-Updates_Watchdog: Check for duplicate MagicMirror² process and kill it if necessary
VAL_EXT-Updates_Bugsounet: Automatic update of all modules designed by @bugsounet
VAL_EXT-Website_APIDocs: Renders the EXT-Website API documentation in your browser (http://xx.xx.xx.xx:8081/api/docs)
VAL_EXT-YouTube_Width: Width of the your YouTube window (can be a px value too)
VAL_EXT-YouTube_Height: Height of the your YouTube window (can be a px value too)
VAL_EXT-YouTube_Display: Should the YouTube windows have to be always displayed when a video is not playing ?
VAL_EXT-YouTube_Header: Display a few seconds in popup the title found of the video
VAL_EXT-YouTube_Password: The password associated to your usernane (sended by @bugsounet)
VAL_EXT-YouTubeCast_Name: Name of the MagicMirror² cast device
VAL_EXT-YouTubeCast_Port: Port of the MagicMirror² cast device
